purpose: To facilitate the development and deployment of reasoning systems, particularly in reinforcement learning and contextual bandit problems.
principle: Built on PyTorch, it leverages model-based and model-free reinforcement learning algorithms and contextual bandit approaches.
reusability: Offers modular components and APIs for integrating with various machine learning workflows, supports custom environments and policies.
limitations: Primarily focused on Python and requires understanding of reinforcement learning concepts; may not be suitable for non-technical users.
name: ReAgent
description: A platform for Reasoning systems (Reinforcement Learning, Contextual Bandits, etc.)
highlight: A versatile platform for building and deploying reasoning systems using reinforcement learning and contextual bandits.
